column2: "Paul
column4: nye onua Timoti dze kɛma Faelemɔn hɛn dɔfo nye hɛn nyɛnko dwumayɛnyi
column8: nye asɔr a ɔwɔ wo fie no:"

column2: "Adom nka hom nye asomdwee a ofir hɛn Egya Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest hɔ."
"Mekaa wo wɔ me mpaabɔ mu a
column5: "osiandɛ metse wo dɔ a ewɔ wɔ ahotseweefo nyina ho
column6: nye wo gyedzi wɔ Ewuradze Jesus Kraest mu no."

column2: "Mobɔ mpaa dɛ ndzepa nyina a ɔnam Kraest do wɔ wo mu no ho nyimdzee bɛma wo gyedzi ayamuyie ndwuma no ada edzi yie."
"Mo nua
column3: menya enyigye nye awerɛkyekyer kɛse wɔ wo dɔ ho
column4: osiandɛ ahotseweefo akoma atɔ hɔn yamu wɔ ɔwo ntsi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: kaansa meyɛ ndam pii wɔ Kraest mu dɛ mebɛhyɛ wo wɔ dza ɔsɛ ho a
column7: na afei meyɛ Jesus Kraest daduanyi so:"

column2: "mototɔ serɛ wo ma me ba a mawo no wɔ m'efiadze ndae mu
"Onɛsimɔs (a nkan no nna no ho nnyi mfaso mma wo
column3: na afei dze no ho wɔ mfaso ma emi nye ɔwo no)."

column2: "Ɔnoarankasa na masoma no wo hɔ bio
column3: onyia a ɔtse dɛ mara m'akoma no a."

column2: "Na nkyɛ mepɛ dɛ misianka no me nkyɛn
column3: ama oeedzi w'ananmu asom me wɔ asɛmpa no n'efiadze ndae no mu:"

column2: "naaso mammpɛ dɛ migya wo ekyir yɛ biribiara
column3: amma w'ayamuyie aannyɛ dɛ ofi nhyɛ mu
column4: na mbom efi woara wo pɛ mu."

column2: "Na bi a iyi ntsi na ɔnye wo dzii mpaamu kakra
column7: onua dɔfo a oye ma me kɛse

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ ibu me dɛ nyɛnko pa dze a
"Na sɛ ɔayɛ wo bɔn biara
column3: anaa ɔdze wo kaw bi a

column2: "Marankasa Paul na medze me nsa rekyerɛw dɛ emi mara mubotua. Na woara wo kaw a edze me a wankasa wo ho mpo ka ho no dze
"Nyew
column4: ma minnya wo ho mfaso wɔ Ewuradze mu; na m'ahom nka mo ho wɔ Kraest mu."

column2: "Ɔnam dɛ mowɔ awerɛhyɛmu wɔ wo setsie ho ntsi na merekyerɛw wo
column3: minyim dɛ ebɛyɛ ma akyɛn dza mebisa yi mpo."

column2: "Afei so
column4: na mowɔ enyisun dɛ ɔnam hom mpaabɔ ntsi

column2: "Epafras
column3: me nyɛnko daduanyi wɔ Kraest Jesus mu no kyia wo

column2: "Mark
"Ewuradze Jesus Kraest adom nka hom sunsum."
